column1: Kata Robata////The Kitchen does a great job
column2: as the best thing we had was the hot pork belly app. The sashimi yellowfin app was excellent and fresh as well. But the rolls were quite basic and lacking complexity. We ordered 2 rolls
column4: we weren't impressed with the first 2 to spend another $15-$20 on a third
column5: and we even passed on what sounded like an amazing dessert. Maybe we just chose poorly
column6: but for us it was quite hit and miss.
